an10.77:1.1: “Mendicants, a crow has ten bad qualities.
an10.77:1.3: They’re rude and impudent, gluttonous and voracious, cruel and pitiless, weak and raucous, unmindful and acquisitive.
an10.77:1.4: A crow has these ten bad qualities.
an10.77:1.5: In the same way, a bad mendicant has these ten bad qualities.
an10.77:1.7: They’re rude and impudent, gluttonous and voracious, cruel and pitiless, weak and raucous, unmindful and acquisitive.
an10.77:1.8: A bad mendicant has these ten bad qualities.”
